1.content: Welcome to the Loud House Giantess Interactive! Now let's get the ball rolling. I've always liked the Loud House and the Casagrandes and how the characters are designed. So I thought it would be fun to get a bug's eye view of the girls and how they look from a tiny perspective. How will this story begin?
1.title: Let's Get Started!

11.content: So which boy will shrink to tiny size?
11.title: Single shrinking (Male).

111.content:
Where does our white-haired hero end up shrunken?

Home at the Loud House: Giantesses = Lincoln's Sisters and Mother.

Royal Woods Elementary School: It can be any of Lincoln's little sisters and even their classmates, along any other good looking girls from Lincoln's school.

Royal Woods Middle School: Lynn, her friends and classmates and any other girl in Lynn's middle school.

Royal Woods High School: Any of Lincoln's older sisters, their classmates and any other girls at their high school.

Royal Woods Mall: It can still be any of the girls from any school above, or even any other known female character.

The Casagrandes Apartment: choices are Ronnie Anne, her mother, or any of her female Casagrande relatives. The choices also include the other female tenants in the building or anyone else in Great Lakes City.
111.title: Lincoln Loud.

1112.content:
In which school is Lincoln shrunken in?

Royal Woods Elementary School: It can be any of Lincoln's little sisters and even their classmates, along any other good looking girls from Lincoln's school.

Royal Woods Middle School:Lynn, her friends and classmates and any other girl in Lynn's middle school.

Royal Woods High Schoo:l Any of Lincoln's older sisters, their classmates and any other girls at their high school.
1112.title: Royal Woods Educational System.

11121.content: Who is Lincoln tiny around? Will it be one of his little sisters or any of the other girl students?
11121.title: Elementary school.

111212.content: Let's start with some of the girls Lincoln's age.
111212.title: Other girls.

111212333.content: Turns out there are lots background characters that remain unnamed. Until now.
111212333.title: Someone else.

11121233333.content: Now going down to lower grade students. Here are a few fourth graders.
11121233333.title: Younger Students

1112123333333.content: And there are also a few pretty hot teachers, like Miss Dimartino.
1112123333333.title: The Faculty.

11122.content: Who will Lincoln be shrunken around in Lynn's middle school. Is it going to be Lynn or one of the other girls in the middle school?
11122.title: Middle School.

111222.content:
I can think of a few like her friend Margo Roberts.

Then there's her basketball team, the Turkey Jerkies:
Amy; Maya; Paula; Diane.

And what about one girl named Cici?
111222.title: Other girls.

11123.content: Lincoln is now the size of a bug in Royal Woods High School. Who is he tiny around? Is it one of his older sisters or some of the other pretty ladies in the school? Or maybe even Ms. Rivers, the principal.
11123.title: High school.

111232.content: To start off, how about Leni's best friends Jackie and Mandee.
111232.title: Other students.

1112323.content:
There are also Lori's friends.
1. Carol Pingrey
2. Becky
3. Dana
4. Darcy Helmandollar's big sister, Teri
5. Whitney
1112323.title: Someone else.

11123233.content: There is still Dana. I've read fanfics about her liking Lincoln a lot. And there's also Teri and Whitney.
11123233.title: Someone else.

111232333.content: Next up are Luna's friends. First choice is her girlfriend and bandmate Sam Sharp. Second choice is her other bandmate Mazzy.
111232333.title: Luna's Friends

1112323333.content: Finally for being tiny in his big sisters' high school, we have Luan's drama club. The club consists of the girls: Ruby, Shannon, Amy, Lyberti, and Parvana.
1112323333.title: The Drama Club.

11123233333.content: Still Amy, Lyberti, and Parvana.
11123233333.title: Someone else.

1113.content:
Where is Lincoln tiny, again?

Royal Woods Mall: It can still be any of the girls from any school above, or even any other known female character.

The Casagrandes Apartment: choices are Ronnie Anne, her mother, or any of her female Casagrande relatives. The choices also include the other female tenants in the building or anyone else in Great Lakes City.
1113.title: The Mall or somewhere else.

11132.content:
Who is Lincoln tiny around in the Casagrande's apartment?

1. Ronnie's family with her mother and the other women in the Casagrande family.
2. Lincoln might also be in the Chang family's apartment with Ronnie Anne's best friend Sid and her sister Adelaide, or...
3. Lincoln is in one of the other rooms in the bodega with some of the other female tenants.
11132.title: The Casagrandes Apartment.

12.content:
Which girl shrinks in the Loud House/Casagrandes world?

1. Girls in the Loud House.
2. Girls in the Casagrandes.
3. Background Characters.
12.title: Single shrinking (Female).

info.brief_description: Characters from the Loud House/Casagrandes either shrink or grow in size. Please ADD.
info.description:
This is my first interactive so I hope it goes well. I like shrinking and giantess material but not big on getting too intimate. In this story, characters from Nickelodeon's "The Loud House" and "The Casagrandes" get shrunken down to tiny size or grow gigantic. They have micro adventures anywhere in the show's universe.

Look here to see any of their designs along with the background characters:
https://theloudhouse.fandom.com/wiki/Category:Females

Rules:
1. Shrinking males and females are allowed. Minimum Shrinking size = 1 inch
2. Giantess only, NO giant males. Giantess Maximum size = 5000 feet
3. Interaction is F/F or F/M only.
4. Please use proper grammar and spelling.
5. First choose who shrinks and then specify where they are shrunk.
6. Keep the giantesses unaware for the most part until stated otherwise.
7. Characters are indestructible and cannot die.
8. No one sentence chapters, unless it's an important choice.
9. Do not end the story too soon.

ALLOWED:
1. Stomping on shrunken characters.
2. Soft Vore only.
3. Any body entrance is fine (Mouth, Ears, or Nose).
4. Endosomatophilia (traveling through giantess bodies).
5. Unaware giantess.
6. In between breasts.
7. Hair forest (Hair on head not in private area).
8. Gentle Giantess.
9. Romance with F/M.

NOT ALLOWED:
1. Blood and Gore.
2. Scat.
3. Sex.
4. Toilet stuff.
5. Hard Vore.

Feel free to add in any other characters that aren't on the list. I will start the first one off to show you how I want it. Enjoy!
